text: Miring inkhat manu thojarra thina khan wai aroon, ajarchu khawa miring inkhat manu thojarra eii. Takkha Jisu Christa! miring inkhat bit in angme i-naleithopi chuonthoman kha angtuk kalokme, Pathian riangwai lokna khat-um amale leilamma kadik imin-ejei kamu inmani rakip in, Christa le inringkhuo ah wai inroonsik eii.
